data.title: University of the East Alumni Association
data.text:
UE Alumni Grand Reunion 2024

We are thrilled to invite you to the University of the East Alumni Grand Reunion 2024. This momentous event will take place at the elegant Century Park Hotel in Malate, Manila on November 16, 2024 (Saturday). It is time again to reconnect, reminisce, and celebrate the enduring esprit de corps that binds us all.

Learn more Register

Call for nomination for the Outstanding Alumni 2024

Join us in Nominating OUTSTANDING ALUMNI – Open Call to the University of the East Community

What’s New

Discover the latest articles from previous or incoming events of UEAAI. What you can see below this sections are

UE Alumni Global Reunion 2023

UE Graduates from different generations gather to re-connect from all over the world

UE 74th Alumni Homecoming 2022

See what’s in store for last year’s Alumni Homecoming.

UEAAI Projects & Scholarships

Aside from yearly gatherings, learn more about the noble endeavors of the UEAAI in different fields.

UE 73rd Alumni Homecoming 2021

See what’s in store for last year’s Alumni Homecoming.

HOMEWARD BOUND

8th SOLO EXHIBITIONS, 2022

ED Arcilla’s best break of all, in his illustrious career, is to have a solo exhibit at his alma mater, the University of the East.

Sponsors of UE 74th Alumni Homecoming 2022

We would like to thank you for your generous contribution to our event. Your support helped us to create this “UE 74th Alumni Homecoming 2022 Tara sa isang Malualhating Pagkikita”. We look forward to have you again next year.

Jubilarian

We know, there are many accomplished sons and daughters of Lualhati who are out there, deserving of this award. Really, we are excited to find you.

Atty. Rosario S. Bernaldo

UEAAI Former President

It’s always a challenge serving this committee for years, many are deserving; few are chosen & many are reserved for next year!”

Dean Norberto Victa Rayupa

UEAAI Ex-Officio | Chairman, Awards Committee 2023

For this year’s jubilarians are the following UE batches: 1949, Diamond Jubilarians (75 yrs.); 1954, Platinum Jubilarians (70 yrs.); 1959, Blue Sapphire Jubilarians (65 yrs.); 1964, Diamond Jubilarians (60 yrs.); 1969, Emerald Jubilarians (55 yrs.); 1974, Gold Jubilarians (50 yrs.); 1979: Sapphire Jubilarians (45 yrs.); 1984, Ruby Jubilarians (40 yrs.); 1989, Coral Jubilarians (35 yrs.); 1994, Pearl Jubilarians (30 yrs.); and 1999, Silver Jubilarians (25 yrs.).

EVENT Sponsors

Be a Registered Member

A registered member is an active member who updatedly pays his or her annual or lifetime membership fee and thereby issued a membership card – the UE Alumni Card which serves as a valid ID to present upon entering the premises of UE and use only its Library facilities. Tie-ups and collaborations for possible discounts and perks inclusive with the card are in still in the offing.
